content: this project was inspired by flowers which is not your usual choice for wintery ornaments but i think it works an elegant star shape can be modified in the process of blocking and stiffening creating more or less pointy snowflake arms this snowflake is a part of the 2025 free crochet snowflake patterns collection see all snowflake patterns here on crochetpedia com 1 the pattern is available in the form of **written instructions** and **video tutorials** for right- and left-handed crocheters 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflakes-mini-cal/
